title: Traveler Early Morning Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Traveler Early Morning Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Traveler Early Morning Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 215
items.arabic: ((سَمَّعَ سَامِعٌ بِحَمْدِ اللَّهِ، وَحُسْنِ بَلاَئِهِ عَلَيْنَا، رَبَّنَا صاحِبْنَا، وَأَفْضِلْ عَلَيْنَا، عَائِذاً بِاللَّهِ مِنَ النَّارِ)).
items.transliteration: SamiAAa samiAAun bihamdil-lahi wahusni bala-ihi AAalayna. Rabbana sahibna wa-afdil AAalayna AAa-ithan billahi minan-nar.
items.translation: May a witness, be witness to our praise of Allah for His favours and bounties upon us.  Our Lord, protect us, show favour on us and deliver us from every evil.  I take refuge in Allah from the fire.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء الصباح
